name: Credit Card Debt
whyBad: The high interest eats your future earnings.

name: Payday Loans
whyBad: These are debt traps designed to keep you poor.

name: Overdraft Fees
definition: Penalties for spending more than you have.
whyBad: Pure loss of capital with zero benefit.

name: Car Loan
definition: Debt on a vehicle that is losing value.
whyBad: You pay interest on an asset that is depreciating.

name: Student Loans
whyBad: High monthly payments limit your investment power.

name: Personal Loans
whyBad: Reduces your monthly disposable income.

name: Mortgage
definition: Debt used to purchase real estate.
whyBad: While common, it's still a massive monthly drain.

name: Gambling Debt
whyBad: High risk, high stress, zero productive value.

name: Medical Bills
whyBad: Creates financial pressure during physical recovery.

name: Store Credit
whyBad: Encourages unnecessary consumer spending.

name: Home Equity Loan
definition: Using your house as collateral for cash.
whyBad: Puts your shelter at risk if you can't pay.

name: Outstanding Invoices
whyBad: Damages your business reputation and credit.

name: Margin Debt
definition: Borrowing money from a broker to buy stocks.
whyBad: Can lead to margin calls and total wipeout.

name: Title Loans
definition: High-interest loans using your car as bait.
whyBad: Risk of losing your primary transportation.

name: Late Fees
whyBad: Literal money for nothing given to others.

name: Lawsuit Judgments
definition: Money owed due to a court losing.
whyBad: Unplanned, massive hits to your net worth.

name: Timeshare Fees
definition: Annual maintenance for a vacation spot.
whyBad: A forever cost for something hard to sell.

name: Subscription Creep
whyBad: Small leaks that drain your wealth over time.

name: Pawn Shop Loans
whyBad: Extremely high interest and risk of losing items.

name: Business Debt
definition: Loans taken to run a company.
whyBad: If the business fails, you are still liable.

name: Rent Owed
whyBad: Risk of eviction and loss of stability.

name: Utility Arrears
whyBad: Threatens your basic living conditions.

name: Private Loans
whyBad: Can ruin personal relationships and trust.

name: Lease Obligations
whyBad: You pay for use but never own the item.

name: Warranty Renewals
whyBad: Usually costs more than the potential repair.
